file_content.text: May the Mystics see no shadows upon you, and the duty to all weigh lightly.
You return. Victorious?
The monstrosities should no longer be a problem.
I've done as you asked.
I had everything under control.
There was no need for concern.
I had my hands full out there.
I will report. Your Empire is reflected well.
Your General Rosh asked you to report.
Destroy the monstrosities.
Greetings, Commander. General Rosh sent me to offer assistance.
General Rosh thought you might need a hand.
Greetings, General Rosh thought that the Empire might be able to assist you with your problem here.
Your offer is welcome.
The Gormak send their monstrosities.
Cleanse the wilds of these monstrosities.
Leave it to me.
It would be my pleasure.
What should I know about these "monstrosities" before I go?
Tell me about these monsters.
Their strength is vast, keep beyond their reach.
Monstrosities? No problem.
Be well.
I will speak later.
